items.sentence: Tom wakes up every three hours during the night, while Mary sleeps all the way through.
The twins look so much alike it's next to impossible to distinguish one from the other.
The girl said she was going shopping with her mother, and didn't listen to what I said.
I used the new corkscrew that Tom gave me to open the bottle of wine that Mary gave me.
Tom started to answer the question and then realized that it was a rhetorical question.
